explanation: Funds are required to be realigned to the Operation and Maintenance, Air Force Reserve, 25/25, appropriation from the Operation and Maintenance, Air Force, 25/25, appropriation for the proper execution of funds for Tactical Combat Casualty Care Tier 3 training ($0.518 million) and Sexual Assault Prevention and Response integrated primary prevention program aimed at preventing harmful behaviors in the military community ($1.357 million). These funds were requested and appropriated in the incorrect appropriation. This action does not change the purpose for which the funds were originally appropriated.
